['I worked at PS 161, and want to direct my comment to prospective teachers thinking about working here.

Worst of all, one of the APs is a bully who likes to play favorites and abuse her power. Teachers live in fear of getting yelled at and written up for minor incidents. She has a need to control everything: your bulletin boards, your classroom furniture, your lesson plans. UFT knows about this, but she gets away with it because she will argue with everything and twist the contract wording around. She barges in on teachers during their prep/lunch to make them do something. She has even threatened not to recommend tenure for effective-rated teachers. I firmly believe she is the main reason why 161 has high teacher turnover.

I wish everyone the best and hope that if anything, the level of true, honest communication gets better because the only way we are going to help our boys to achieve the things that we hope for them is to work together.', 'Two years ago, I posted the wonderful review below about Eagle Academy after the completion of my son's first year.
